item.description:
Movie: Planet of the Apes and/or Brian Greene's Fabric of the Cosmos (Part 1) on Blue Ray

Bring theater-friendly finger food to share and optional Yankee Swap/White Elephant gift of < $20 if you wish to participate in the solstice celebration of gift swapping.

The location has been changed to Todd & Daisy's home due to a last minute holiday party for the higher up in commands at the Naval base.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Movie & Potluck Night!
